entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @HHS_ASH So Trump what delusional shit will you be tweeting tonight at 3:00am?  Maybe you should substitute your adderall for some ambien. Perhaps then you can rescuse yourself  from your psychotic self and actually lead a country that is losing thousands of Americans to Covid19.
